title: Frostbase
author: Frostbase
content: Hello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to prove

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I suggest building your portfolio first online, working for internship roles, volunteer roles, or other probationary roles to prove your skills online will be best if you're a beginner in the space. This is just from personal experience and I know this isn't necessary for all but I just want to share for awareness since almost all employers asked for working experience (you will be surprised that you wanted to have experience yet they require you to have an experience, ironic).A good read and you'll find information right there on where to find those jobs, mostly crypto related (what can you expect, you post this "I need to find a job" in a crypto related forum, so I think it's appropriate to link a crypto related article): https://www.getrevue.co/profile/masonnystrom/issues/how-to-get-a-job-in-web3-971512

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: If you sell a service, you can get it even in a day (at your rate).It's a good idea to describe your skills that stand out, if it's related to digital work like web design it would be better. As a reminder, there are no freelancers with a guaranteed weekly income. Make sure you have a steady job out there.Good luck.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to proveFixed income or occasional? You can earn that amount or higher by applying as an Article writer on casinos and crypto news company but there’s no assurance that you can have this job offer in regular basis because most of them are only accepting freelance work so you can only earn that amount per project based. Try to browse a couple of thread here in the services section that related with publication because I saw some of this job offer recently.Try this one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5331901.0

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to proveYes it's possible I encourage you to roam around the service section and check the competition and see what others are offering that you are also offering, we are all freelancers here, then if you think that can keep up with the competition, then open your own service announcement mention your skills, what you can do and your past clients if you don't have one here yet, you can offer free service while building up your portfolio.

comments.author: Karma24
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to proveDepends, can you do something worth 100 dollars ?

comments.author: marcotheminer
comments.body: I'll pay you $10 commission for each valid person you refer to buy a miner (see signature).

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Fiverr or Upwork.Go to those freelancing websites and offer your translation service aside from posting it on the forum. Despite having no experience of working online.Get some topics that you would like to translate and that can be part of your portfolio as what the others have suggested to you of trying to build it up.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to proveSince you are a beginner, i would say that you would not be able to earn 100$ a week initially. I am not disappointing you but seeing that you have no big skill and never earned online, it's hard to start earning big. You might have to work for free to build up your portfolio, try to learn skills, etc and all this will take time. Once you are an experienced person in your skillset, you will never need to ask how and where to earn as opportunities automatically come to you.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to prove100$ is not huge and achievable but make sure you are knowledgeable on crypto if you want to focus here because you need this for your future venture since if you don't know anything about it and try to compete with experience guys well you might not get what you expect here.You can start reading more information about cryptocurrency and be updated with latest news and current trends about happening on crypto since you can use this on your career. Try to see if you can work with social media moderation,article translation,do odd jobs, and other more which you can search here.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: You have been registered on the forum since March. You also write that you have two languages that you speak well. Why not join the forum more closely, learn as much as possible about bitcoin and cryptocurrency, and improve your level of knowledge? $100 a week on the Internet without work experience is very difficult to get, and more additional knowledge is needed, so I just suggest that you start developing in your free time. Having a forum rank and earning extra income in today's times is a very advantageous position, in addition to the fact that you can meet people and maybe offer article translation services.My thought and advice are, do not sit idle, do not wait to be found, and develop yourself more.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: You can work in the forum or outside the forum. Jobs are very diversifying and depends on what skills you have, you can take them.[Overview] Bitcointalk Services from Bitcointalk MembersOverview of Bitcointalk Signature-Ad Campaignshttps://hyve.works/Beincrypto.com (Remote jobs)Forum is not an ATM so you must Work-to-Earn. Good luck

comments.author: sovie
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to prove$ 100 is a big amount - did you know how much I earned online which was the first amount I earned after almost a week of hard work. It was $ 5 and I got $ 4 in my account. And you think earning is that easy. what skill will you sell bytheway.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: sovie on August 07, 2022, 08:54:22 PMQuote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to prove$ 100 is a big amount - did you know how much I earned online which was the first amount I earned after almost a week of hard work. It was $ 5 and I got $ 4 in my account. And you think earning is that easy. what skill will you sell bytheway. Its seems like OP thinks that this forum is a money making machine where he will be able to earn 100$ a week. To be very realistic, without any skill or business, it is impossible to earn money here or anywhere in the world. Since i do not what is the educational background and experience of OP, i would suggest him to accept wok with low wages also in order to gain experience and keep learning according to your skill.

comments.author: marcotheminer
comments.body: Quote from: marcotheminer on August 04, 2022, 05:54:58 PMI'll pay you $10 commission for each valid person you refer to buy a miner (see signature).OP seems not willing to reply in his own thread..

comments.author: lucifur
comments.body: Quote from: livingfree on August 04, 2022, 06:30:05 PMFiverr or Upwork.Go to those freelancing websites and offer your translation service aside from posting it on the forum. Despite having no experience of working online.Get some topics that you would like to translate and that can be part of your portfolio as what the others have suggested to you of trying to build it up.I think that these 2 platforms are oversaturated thus making it hard to get an actual good paying gig unless you are very skilled in the service that you are offering. I have been in upwork for months now and hardly get any good clients for long term due to the number of competition. It became even harder when the pandemic started where most people turned to online freelancing as their source of income.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Frostbase on August 04, 2022, 12:41:06 PMHello,Is there any way to earn like 100 dollars here by working? I do write on occasion, and I do understand Swedish and English, so I can translate as well, though I never worked online at all, and am just a beginner. Any work available would be very helpful  maybe even do a sample work as well to proveIt's important that you have a good portfolio and you have diverse skills, the competition here is very stiff you are up against established freelancers but its still worth giving it a shot, we have to start if we want to establish here and you can start by creating your portfolio here by offering free service and showing what you can do that is very much different from all the others here.
